issue.title: [Dev] archery trigger-bot should use logger.exception
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12376](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12376). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/9c85e5465a5738f5ba9a2455d1b566948f89d0f3/dev/archery/archery/bot.py#L145-L150>

We should use `logger.exception` not `logger.error` to get the full traceback, else it's harder to tell what happened.
